settings.title: Ingredients
settings.text:
1 scoop Sproos Super Hot Chocolate
1/2 cup all natural almond butter
2 tablespoons maple syrup
2 teaspoons cinnamon
1/2 cup coconut oil
1/4 cup chocolate chips
1 tablespoon maca powder
a pinch of flakey salt

settings.title: Method
settings.text:
1) Add all ingredients (except the salt) to a small saucepan.
2) Over low heat, stir all ingredients together until coconut oil, almond butter and chocolate chips have all melted.

3) Pour melted mixture into an ice cube tray or small container and place in freezer for 1 hour or until hardened. We recommend using silicon ice cube trays as it makes it easier to remove the fudge squares once formed!
4) After 1 hour remove fudge squares from the ice cube tray or container, top with flakey salt and enjoy! Recipe makes about 6 squares. Store in the fridge.
